description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

quests.name: An Infinite Welcome
quests.description: Q has invited you to enter the Continuum, represented by a door that presumably leads to a house. Enter and explore!

reward.name: Dilithium
reward.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

reward.name: Honor
reward.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

reward.name: Dilithium
reward.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

quests.name: The Vedek's Trail
quests.description: Teero Anaydis is the prime suspect behind an otherwise inexplicable Bajoran mutiny, but the trail has gone cold. Pick it up and find him!

quests.name: Stolen Honor
quests.description: Augment agents have robbed the Klingon Empire of valuable cultural artifacts. Gowron has requested your assistance in their return.

quests.name: The Wrong Crowd
quests.description: An adult version of Worf's son Alexander has joined the Augments! Repel them from the House of Martok on Worf's behalf.

challenges.name: Beam into Hand to Hand Combat

ship.name: Constellation Class
ship.flavor: Uniquely designed with four warp nacelles. Most often deployed for exploration and defensive patrols.
